title.rendered: PROFESSIONAL AIRCRAFT ACCESSORIES EXTENDS SCOPE OF OPERATIONS TO INCLUDE BOEING 737 LANDING GEAR AND IDGS

content.rendered:
Professional Aircraft Accessories, a Greenwich AeroGroup company, announced today that it is now offering complete landing gear overhaul and repair services on Boeing 737 700/800 model aircraft, as well as component repair and overhaul services on Boeing 737 Integrated Drive Generators.

An Aircraft Component Maintenance, Repair and Overhaul facility, Professional Aircraft Accessories has been providing comprehensive component repairs and landing gear overhaul for more than two decades.

“Adding Boeing 737 landing gear and IDG repair to our capabilities was a natural evolution given our extensive experience and successful history with other fleet types,” said Professional Aircraft Accessories Vice President of Sales and Marketing Mark Iddon. “We have more than 20 years of very successful experience working with large landing gears such as Lockheed Martin’s P-3, Bombardier CRJs, and Embraer regional aircraft. Our team is extremely proficient when it comes to providing integrated landing gear services.”

Professional Aircraft currently provides commercial and regional aircraft CR&O services for Airbus, ATR, Boeing, Bombardier CRJ, Embraer ERJ and Lockheed Martin aircraft.
